665170.name: BULLET SOUL INFINITE BURST - Original Soundtrack
665170.description:
Bullet Soul - Infinite Burst - Original Soundtrack for STEAM
This DLC delivers not only the in-game tunes from the main game, but also all the music included in the original Xbox 360 DLC as an added bonus!
Composers Kenji Ito and Kohta Takahashi, join forces as RESONATOR.
Arranged by Jake “Virt”Kaufman

* Both MP3 and FLAC will be downloaded into your local BULLET SOUL Steam folder.

Track listing:

01: SELECT - Arrange
02: STAGE 1 - Arrange
03: BOSS - Arrange
04: STAGE 2 - Arrange
05: STAGE 3 - Arrange
06: STAGE 4 - Arrange
07: STAGE 5 - Arrange
08: FINAL BOSS - Arrange
09: TRUE BOSS - Arrange
10: ESCAPE - Arrange
11: NAME - Arrange
12: GAME OVER - Arrange
